h2_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two
content: Once the fight is over, The Great Sage's Broken Shell will be vanquished, and a cutscene will begin. The Great Sage will stumble in the water and the relics will leave his body as golden orbs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Great_Sage's_Broken_Shell.md', within the main section titled 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell', specifically from the subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'The Great Sage's Broken Shell Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
Once the fight is over, The Great Sage's Broken Shell will be vanquished, and a cutscene will begin. The Great Sage will stumble in the water and the relics will leave his body as golden orbs.
